sourcesContent:
// ViewIssueModal.js import React from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; export default function ViewIssueModal({ issue, onClose }) { if (!issue) return null; // Normalize solution object const solution = issue.solution || (Array.isArray(issue.solutions) ? issue.solutions[0] : null); const solvedBy = solution?.solvedBy || {}; return (

Issue Details

Reported By

NT ID: {issue.ntId || '-'}

Email: {issue.email || '-'}

{solution && typeof solution === 'object' && (

Solved By

NT ID: {solvedBy.ntId || '-'}

Email: {solvedBy.email || '-'}

Solution Type: {solution.category || '-'}

)}

Project Details

Project Name: {issue.projectName || '-'}

Customer: {issue.customerName || '-'}

Rated Power: {issue.ratedPower || '-'} kW

Rated Speed: {issue.ratedSpeed || '-'} rpm

Application: {issue.application || '-'}

Legislation: {issue.legislation || '-'}

FIE System: {issue.fieSystem || '-'}

EGT System: {issue.egtSystem || '-'}

Fuel Type: {issue.fuelType || '-'}

Issue Type: {issue.issueType || '-'}

Issue Description

{issue.description || '-'}

{Array.isArray(issue.files) && issue.files.length > 0 && (

Attachments

    {issue.files.map((file) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)} {solution && (

Solution

Description: {solution.description || '-'}

{Array.isArray(solution.files) && solution.files.length > 0 && (

Solution Attachments

    {solution.files.map((file) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)}
)}
); }
